column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Went here late Saturday night
column2: we ordered 2 different types of west coast oysters and a crab cake to start.  Then had a filet and obviously the dry aged ribeye with the Brussel sprouts
column3: truffle mac and sweet potato.  Service was excellent
column4: with two small exceptions.  First we never received any bread
column5: we were definitely looking forward to this after reading reviews so that was disappointing.  Second
column6: the sweet potato was just not good
column8: served with far too much brown sugar which was also slightly burned
column9: leaving a very poor after-taste.  Our server was good
column10: inquiring with us about whether we didn't like it
column12: we were still charged for it.  Not a big deal
column13: but just one of those small things that can sway one from coming back again soon.
